column1: Ability to automate common tasks such as responding to phishing attacks and failed user logins
column3: Does the tool automate tasks in a way that would increase efficiency?

column1: Playbooks or workflows that are easy to create, configure, share, and combine
column3: Does the tool provide steps (playbook, workflow) that guide tier 1 or junior analysts through common tasks?

column1: Ability to rank / score alerts so that analysts can easily prioritize alerts from most to least significant
column3: Does the tool present and prioritize data in a way that is beneficial?

column1: Ability for analysts in different geographic locations to work simultaneously on an investigation
column3: Does the tool enable multiple analysts to effectively collaborate (simultaneously)?

column1: Ability to prepopulate alert and logging data into tickets
column3: Does the tool enable a hand off of investigations (for example, between two shifts or across SOCs)?

column1: Ability to ingest custom logging / alert formats
column3: Do you think this tool could effectively ingest the data in your SOC?
